attributes.action: Twin all Britains primary and secondary schools with poor schools of Africa.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: From this schools can create charity events or raise funds from its students, possibly sending old clothing parcels or items to the twinned school if its required? Oxfam or another chraity would assit in handling the monies or items to ensure they get to the destinations. Cultual learnings would benifit of the twinned school. More thought needs go into the idea, but its a start in helping a poor nation.
